Julian Reschke <julian.reschke@...> writes:

> So, at the end of the day, where's the advantage over using WebDAV, 
> except for the problem that WebDAV seems to suffer from an "not invented 
> here" image over here?

Because browsers don't have good webdav clients, lots of languages
don't have good webdav clients, webdav clients are hardly ever
installed and are bloody hard to write, etc...

webdav is not REST because REST is the HTTP verbs.

[sticks out tongue and make "nya" noise]
